summary: Fincas (Farms) module fully tested. Backend: 18/18 tests pass (CRUD, filters, stats, SIGPAC data). Frontend: 9/9 E2E tests pass (page load, form display, CRUD operations, filters). All features working correctly including complete form with all sections, stat cards, filtering by type/provincia, expandable card details, and SIGPAC data persistence.
seed_data_creation: Test fincas created and deleted during tests. No persistent seed data added.
context_for_next_testing_agent:
Fincas module is fully tested. The module provides complete CRUD for farm management including:
- Create finca with all fields: Denominación, Provincia, Población, Polígono, Parcela, Subparcela, Finca Propia checkbox, Hectáreas, Áreas, Toneladas, Producción Esperada/Disponible, SIGPAC data (8 fields), Recolección (Semana, Año), Precios (Corte, Transporte, Proveedor), Observaciones
- List fincas with filters by search, provincia, type (Propias/Alquiladas)
- Expandable card view showing all details
- Stats showing totals for fincas, hectareas, production
- Note: Daily summary modal appears after login and may block interactions - use force:true on clicks or close it first with 'Entendido' button

backend_endpoints: POST /api/fincas - Create new finca with all fields
GET /api/fincas - List fincas with filters (search, provincia, finca_propia)
GET /api/fincas/stats - Statistics (total, propias, alquiladas, hectareas, production)
frontend_features: Page displays stats cards (Total Fincas, Fincas Propias, Alquiladas, Total Hectáreas, Prod. Esperada)
Filter section with search, provincia dropdown, type dropdown
Form displays all sections: Datos de la Finca, Superficie y Producción, Datos SIGPAC, Recolección, Precios, Observaciones
Form has all required fields with proper data-testid attributes
Expandable card details show all finca information
